DOC.detailed_description: This prospective observational study transperineal ultrasound 24-42 week gestation prospective longitudinal observational study term ( 37-42 week ) labour woman . AIMS : This study aim firstly assess effectiveness acceptability transperineal ultrasound woman present 24 42 week gestation comparison digital vaginal examination ( VE ) . Secondly , term ( 37-42 week ) labour woman , investigator aim create ultrasound base labour record , `` sonopartogram '' develop predictive model outcome labour .
